item.title: quartz edit tag page
item.description: 🛠️ To edit a tag page Quartz lets you override the default tag listing by creating a file for each tag inside your /content/tags/ folder.

item.title: quartz link to a tag page
item.description: 🔗 To link to a tag page Use Quartz’s internal link syntax: [[tags/plugin]] → links to the tag page for #plugin You can also use [Plugin Notes](tags/plugin) for cleaner display This works just like folder listings, and you can even embed tag pages in other notes or dashboards.
